```fortran
program agc033b
  implicit none
  integer :: h, w, n, sr, sc, usafe, dsafe, l_safe, r_safe
  logical :: end
  integer :: i, stat
  character(len=1), allocatable :: s(:), t(:)
  character(len=200000) :: s_str, t_str

  ! Read input
  read(*, *, iostat=stat) h, w, n, sr, sc
  if (stat /= 0) stop

  ! Allocate arrays
  allocate(s(n), t(n), stat=stat) if (stat /= 0) stop

  ! Read the strings s and t
  read(*,'(A)', iostat=stat) s_str
  read(*,'(A)', iostat=stat) t_str
  if (stat /= 0) stop

  ! Convert to arrays
  do i = 1, n
    s(i) = s_str(i:i)
    t(i) = t_str(i:i)
  end do

  ! Process vertical movement
  usafe = 1
  dsafe = h
  end = .false. do i = n, 1, -1
    if (s(i) == 'U') then
      usafe = usafe + 1
    else if (s(i) == 'D') then
      dsafe = dsafe - 1
    end if
    if (usafe > dsafe) then
      end = .true. exit
    end if
    if (i > 1) then
      if (t(i - 1) == 'U') then
        dsafe = min(dsafe + 1, h)
      else if (t(i - 1) == 'D') then
        usafe = max(usafe - 1, 1)
      end if
    end if
  end do

  ! Process horizontal movement
  l_safe = 1
  r_safe = w
  do i = n, 1, -1
    if (s(i) == 'L') then
      l_safe = l_safe + 1
    else if (s(i) == 'R') then
      r_safe = r_safe - 1
    end if
    if (l_safe > r_safe) then
      end = .true. exit
    end if
    if (i > 1) then
      if (t(i - 1) == 'L') then
        r_safe = min(r_safe + 1, w)
      else if (t(i - 1) == 'R') then
        l_safe = max(l_safe - 1, 1)
      end if
    end if
  end do

  !
```

```fortran
program agc033b
  implicit none
  integer :: h, w, n, sr, sc, usafe, dsafe, l_safe, r_safe
  logical :: end
  integer :: i, stat
  character(len=1), allocatable :: s(:), t(:)
  character(len=200000) :: s_str, t_str

  ! Read input
  read(*, *, iostat=stat) h, w, n, sr, sc
  if (stat /= 0) stop

  ! Allocate arrays
  allocate(s(n), t(n), stat=stat)
  if (stat /= 0) stop

  ! Read the strings s and t
  read(*,'(A)', iostat=stat) s_str
  read(*,'(A)', iostat=stat) t_str
  if (stat /= 0) stop

  ! Convert to arrays
  do i = 1, n
    s(i) = s_str(i:i)
    t(i) = t_str(i:i)
  end do

  ! Process vertical movement
  usafe = 1
  dsafe = h
  end = .false.
  do i = n, 1, -1
    if (s(i) == 'U') then
      usafe = usafe + 1
    else if (s(i) == 'D') then
      dsafe = dsafe - 1
    end if
    if (usafe > dsafe) then
      end = .true.
      exit
    end if
    if (i > 1) then
      if (t(i - 1) == 'U') then
        dsafe = min(dsafe + 1, h)
      else if (t(i - 1) == 'D') then
        usafe = max(usafe - 1, 1)
      end if
    end if
  end do

  ! Process horizontal movement
  l_safe = 1
  r_safe = w
  do i = n, 1, -1
    if (s(i) == 'L') then
      l_safe = l_safe + 1
    else if (s(i) == 'R') then
      r_safe = r_safe - 1
    end if
    if (l_safe > r_safe) then
      end = .true.
      exit
    end if
    if (i > 1) then
      if (t(i - 1) == 'L') then
        r_safe = min(r_safe + 1, w)
      else if (t(i - 1) == 'R') then
        l_safe = max(l_safe - 1, 1)
      end if
    end if
  end do

  ! Check conditions and output
  if (.not. end .and. sr >= usafe .and. sr <= dsafe .and. &
      sc >= l_safe .and. sc <= r_safe) then
    print '("YES")'
  else
    print '("NO")'
  end if

  ! Deallocate
  deallocate(s, t)

end program agc033b
```
